abstract.sentence: This was the kick off meeting of the project about designing a new remote control that should be original, trendy and user friendly.
We went trough project methodology, tool training and project finance.

actions.sentence: Individual actions have been assigned: ID: the working design UID: the technical functions design ME: the user requirements specification.

decisions.sentence: Those decisions that you consider of high importance for your role with a .
It has been decided nothing yet about the role of the remote control.
Should it be device specific or universal ?

problems.sentence: Mark those that you consider of high importance for your role with a .
No problems have been identified yet.
